title: Peter Andre looks completely different after embracing his natural head of curls

Heart throb Peter Andre has taken to his Instagram story to show off his natural curls.

The Australian singer gave fans a close up look at his locks while he played about with them.

The 46 year-old said: "For so many years I would never wear my hair curly because I would get picked on as a kid, but I don't know, I'm trying to adopt them, what do you reckon? Just say yes or no.

"Thing is, I know it's got to be what I'm comfortable with but at the moment I'm not comfortable wearing it curly. Pretty long, eh?

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"Does anyone care? No."

Earlier in the story, Peter gave a glimpse at the curls within a more complete ensemble, as he rocked a sophisticated turtle neck and long coat on the red carpet.

He asked "Shall I wear it naturally curly tonight?" along with "yes" and "no" buttons.

(Image: Instagram)

The star was in a very lavish looking Monte Carlo hotel, along with a pal.

Peter was married to former glamour model Katie Price - the couple called it quits in 2009, and had Junior, 14, and Princess, 12.

He also has five year-old Amelia and two year-old Theodore with his new wife, Emily MacDonagh. The pair got hitched back in 2015 in a lavish Exeter property.

Fans were left in hysterics when Peter managed to prank Princess into thinking he'd bought her an expensive pair of headphones.

"Dad!" Princess shouted as she looked into the empty box, "That is not funny!"
description: Peter confided to his Instagram followers that he hadn't worn his hair curly for years because he was picked on as a kid
